name: Pop Pop Puzzle
description:
Begin to join in the fun! Pop-Pop is an addictive puzzle game with strategy, challenging fun for everyone.

Day and night, pop along with sounds of piano, enjoy and you can't stop!

[FEATURES]

- 2 beautiful themes: Day and Night.
- 2 shapes of blocks: Square and Circle.
- 8 musical scales of piano sound perform on poping.

[HOW TO PLAY]

- Tap two or more blocks of the same color.
- No time limit, try to think out the best way to clear more blocks, accomplish the target points.

[SCORING RULES]

- The more blocks you pop, the more score you will get.
- The less blocks you left at the end, the more bonus you will get.

Score = Blocks * Blocks *5
2 Blocks = 20
3 Blocks = 45
...
10 Blocks = 500
...

Bonus = 2000 - Blocks * Blocks * 20
10 Blocks Left = 0
9 Blocks Left = 380
...
All Block Cleared = 2000
